thread.content:
Powering through with another 2008 classic: "Choke" (unavailable on Blu-ray)

Let's see what sort of hijinks the Choke crew get up to!

Follow us on the hashtag #choketime08
Hi, I'm Hervey and I will be commenting on "Choke" (2008); I'm still coming off the adrenaline high of "Vantage Point" (2008) but I'll do my best to focus #choketime08
Hi, I'm Alan and I'll be commenting on this film. I remember being obsessed with the trailer when it came out because I liked the @cyhsyband song it featured. #choketime08
This really does not shy from opening in a way that tries to evoke "Fight Club" as much as possible #choketime08
Jaunty goofy score really makes the goofiness come alive #choketime08
We have made our way onward into the colonial reenactment venue. Very pleasant setting for a film. #choketime08
The soundtrack is BUMPIN' already. #choketime08
Everything looks so cheap, weirdly desaturated with TV-show sets #choketime08
Good introduction to the Choke mechanic here. #choketime08
Anjelica Huston! #choketime08
Very convincing kid version of Charlie. #choketime08
The cinematographer here did "George Washington" and "All the Real Girls"? I find that really hard to believe, based on how flat and lifeless this movie looks #choketime08
Very depressing hospital environment. Seafoam green walls are never a good call. #choketime08
Good cutthroat negotiator nun here. #choketime08
Young Victor littering with his milk carton is very disturbing. #choketime08
Kelly Macdonald's American accent is hard to place here, feels between neutral and southern, I'm unsettled #choketime08

I don't think using a Victor Double is going to work out for the protagonists of Choke (2008), just as using a Presidential Double didn't work out for the protagonists of Vantage Point (2008). #choketime08
A lot of high-concept hijinks going on here #choketime08
I think the movie is intentionally being drab. That hospital church set could've fairly easily been a lot more visually interesting. #choketime08
From the trailer, I definitely expected more colonial hijinks. I'm glad it's delivering on that now. #choketime08
Damn, I hate having an annoying, low-paying job that is also twee and humorous #choketime08
Is Victor drinking milk? That looks like a large glass of milk. #choketime08
Nonstop drinks of the ep right now. Victor drinking sake right out of the carafe. #choketime08
Child Victor absolutely nailed every single one of those photos. #choketime08
Photobooth sequence a good bit, well-executed, may be the first scene I've really liked at all #choketime08
We have more goofy sperm sample hijinks #choketime08
TWIST ALERT: Victor is the Son of Christ! #choketime08
I missed it earlier: why exactly is he not able to simply hand her a sperm sample in a cup? #choketime08
I'm going to go out on a limb here and say I don't think it's really about his mother. #choketime08
Oh wow, this movie is so deep #choketime08
Satan Said Dance! We've made it. It's THE SONG! #choketime08
Congrats #choketime08

I think the core problem for me is that instead of resonating in terms of universal (or even relatable) experiences with modern alienation or whatever, everything is just cranked up to 100% in quirky specificity #choketime08
It's Christina Pletzger! #choketime08
Heather Burns gave a good performance here, and that was at least a premise #choketime08
Victor has ordered nuts and gotten a massive basket filled with what appears to be a very small quantity of nuts. #choketime08
We're only an hour in? I feel like this has been going on forever #choketime08

How'd I arrive in a place like this?
Red right hand as the alligator kiss.
#choketime08
The Original Choke! #choketime08
Oh wow, a Choke origin story, this is so powerful #choketime08
Christ in a manger imagery here. #GoodBit #PowerfulImagery #choketime08
This sex addict group sure books a large variety of different spaces for their meetings #chokepoint08
"There are no accidents on the circuit, honey." #classicmovielines #chokepoint08
Amazing that local land-use restrictions are allowing this stone structure #choketime08
Good "Cooking With Cheese Recipe Guide" on the fridge there. #CookWithCheese #chokepoint08
Death by pudding. #chokepoint08
Lot of motion required on this school bus wheel to keep the bus moving perfectly straight. #chokepoint08
Building up to a classic Fight Club-esque ending here. #chokepoint08
The music is sounding Pixies-esque all of sudden, yes #choketime08
If I were running a mental hospital, I would not allow a patient to wear a lab coat, it may lead to wacky mix-ups #choketime08
I legitimately did not remember that this was the twist. #choketime08
Good bit. #choketime08
I've learned so much from "Choke" (2008) #choketime08
An innovative film. #choketime08
I didn't have a great time watching this, though at least the back half seemed more ambitious #choketime08
Not the best. And definitely not an Earful film. #choketime08
